HDG.LOG.content: [Heidegger’s ear] hearing more than just picking up sounds, if it is [anatomical, biological], goes in one ear out the other [but, apprehension lives (lebt) only when embodied (leibt)] > in that case, we are not gathered to what is addressed (Zugesprochene) [heterotautology of hearing and hearkening (Horchen)] > wrong direction: turn anatomical hearing into a spiritual one

HDG.LOG.content: “we are all ears when our gathering devotes itself entirely to hearkening” > “we have heard (gehört) when we belong to (gehören) the matter addressed (Zugesprochenen)”: letting that which lies before lie gathered in its entirety [wholeness], selfsameness, omologein, the letting-lie establishes
